title: Seeing The Whole Picture In We'll Go To 'Coney Island'
teaser: In a collection of old photos, Barbara Scheiber spotted her father and his mistress on the Coney Island boardwalk. She talks to NPR's Scott Simon about her new book, We'll Go to Coney Island.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
